org.myrobotlab.memory
Class LocalCache

java.lang.Object
  org.myrobotlab.memory.BaseCache
      org.myrobotlab.memory.LocalCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cache, ManagedCache
public class LocalCache
extends BaseCache

Implementation of the Cache interface that stores information in local memory.

Author:
SwedaKonsult

Constructor Detail

LocalCache

public LocalCache(int initialSize,
                  float loadFactor,
                  int concurrencyLevel,
                  int timeout)
Constructor.

Parameters:
initialCapacity - the initial capacity. The implementation performs internal sizing to accommodate this many elements.
loadFactor - the load factor threshold, used to control resizing. Resizing may be performed when the average number of elements per bin exceeds this threshold.
concurrencyLevel - the estimated number of concurrently updating threads. The implementation performs internal sizing to try to accommodate this many threads.
the - amount of time in ms after which an item should time out.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the initial capacity is negative or the load factor or concurrencyLevel are non-positive.

LocalCache

public LocalCache(int initialCapacity)
Constructor. Default load factor (0.75) and concurrencyLevel (16). Default timeout: 0 (never).

Parameters:
initialCapacity - the initial capacity. The implementation performs internal sizing to accommodate this many elements.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the initial capacity of elements is negative.
